note:
Hi! I'm not LGBT, but I joined this server because it looked the most left-leaning on the server page.

I apologize ahead of time for getting any pronouns wrong. If I do, I promise it's not on purpose, I'm just old and slow.

I know I'm supposed to be civil, but I make no promises if I interact with any fascists, white supremacists, or other far-right savages. Expect me to say a lot about politics.

I'm Japanese, Norwegian, and Swedish. I like cooking.

fields.name: Philosophy
fields.value: resistentialism (belief that inanimate objects are out to get us)
